channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Stage Stars
channel.desc: There is a buzz around the school as the Anything Goes cast list is finally revealed. Will Lucas get the part of Moonface, a role usually reserved for the older years? Best friends Uma and Anna are both hoping for the lead, but will they be happy with their parts? Meanwhile, singer Max has been busy writing new songs over the summer, and his dreams of life as a pop star are ever closer as he releases new music.
